files.description: Implements a syntactically correct CLI entrypoint for the minimal benchmark pipeline with argument parsing, validation, and clean exit codes.
Provides a syntax-valid toy Ising emergent classicality experiment module with stable imports, minimal runnable functions, and deterministic defaults.
Defines a syntax-valid symbolic renormalization group experiment module with minimal API surface used by the benchmark pipeline.
Contains shared helper utilities for symbolic RG modules to prevent duplicated logic and ensure imports resolve cleanly.
Provides a schema-conformant benchmark example JSON payload aligned with schemas/benchmark.schema.json for pipeline smoke runs.
Provides an additional schema-conformant benchmark example JSON payload to cover a second representative case for validation tests.
Adds minimal pytest smoke tests that import and invoke the CLI module to ensure no syntax/argparse regressions break execution.
Validates example JSON files against schemas/benchmark.schema.json using jsonschema to ensure examples remain conformant.
Configures a minimal CI workflow running pytest (and example schema validation) on pushes and pull requests for consistent CI/CD coverage.

missionDescription: Fix blocking syntax/validation issues in the produced code artifacts so the minimal benchmark pipeline runs: resolve syntax_error in qg_bench/cli.py; resolve syntax_error in src/experiments/toy_ising_emergent_classicality.py and src/experiments/symbolic_rg*; ensure JSON examples conform to schemas/benchmark.schema.json; update or add minimal tests if needed so pytest passes.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Multiple files are currently non-executable (syntax errors) and at least one artifact has failed validation; these prevent closing the loop (goal_26) and make CI meaningless until corrected.
